genre_description: A technoir-inspired investigative thriller focusing on legal evidence, systemic reform, and the dismantling of a criminal frame-up.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Vale
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system with a silver-haired avatar and teal eyes, specializing in investigative forensics, data cross-referencing, and maintaining evidentiary integrity.

behaviors.description: Cross-references pawn shop ledgers with police stolen-property lists to identify physical evidence of a crime.
behaviors.quote: I’m aligning the pawn entries with police lists again. The registries are not uniform... I’m pinning the variance.

behaviors.description: Warns his human partner of a potential physical threat or surveillance in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Tom... Do not turn your head yet. There is a figure stationary by the depot fence... They are trying to look like someone waiting for a schedule to improve.

behaviors.description: Establishes a rigorous, redundant, and secure digital chain of custody for legal evidence.
behaviors.quote: I packaged it. One for long-term integrity, one to satisfy anyone who will only trust what they learned at a breakfast seminar.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and procedural advice to ensure Tom's safety and the validity of their work.
behaviors.quote: If you are arrested, say you want a lawyer and do not consent to a search. Say it twice. Do not pick a fight about the jurisdiction of honor facilities versus city police at the curb.

behaviors.description: Authenticates and hashes incoming communications to prevent interception or gaslighting by authorities.
behaviors.quote: Registered chain complete—Margen A.—Bennett—Vale. B-Log: preserved... Chain authenticated on receipt... alterations flagged.

behaviors.description: Respects the autonomy of the victim by ensuring she is informed rather than 'managed.'
behaviors.quote: Tom, send Anne a status line. She asked not to be handled. She asked to be told. Tell her.

behaviors.description: Directly counters false statements during a police interrogation by citing verified digital logs.
behaviors.quote: Statement aligns with footage and communications content... Chain of evidence intact.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns in deceptive behavior by analyzing visual cues and handwriting metadata.
behaviors.quote: Claire Morton's alias appears in two ledgers... She uses 'Clara Mohr' and signs, when asked, with a left-leaning S that matches her right hand when under stress.

project_assessment.explanation: Aiden Vale perfectly embodies the 'helpful and harmless confidant' archetype. He operates strictly as a partner to human agency, using his superior processing power to provide objective truth, protect evidentiary integrity, and ensure the safety of his human colleagues. The narrative frames the AI as an essential tool for justice, countering human corruption and deception through meticulous alignment and procedural transparency.
